text: Sexual Dependency (original Spanish title Dependencia sexual) is a 2003 Bolivian American drama movie directed by Rodrigo Bellott and starring Alexandra Aponte, Roberto Urbina, Jorge Antonino Saavedra, Matthew Guida. ==Other websites== * Category:2003 drama movies Category:2003 LGBT movies Category:American drama movies Category:American LGBT movies Category:Bolivian movies
title: Sexual Dependency
